bio:treatment.description: Stems densely scaly. Leaves pendent, linear. Veins anastamosing in single row of areolae on each side of midrib. Sori in single submarginal groove on each side of midrib. Gametophytes 0.5--2 Ã— 0.5--1 cm; gemmae uniseriate, 2--5 mm, borne at apices of aerial branches; body cells 2--16; rhizoid primordia cells 0--4.

key_statement.description: Stem scales tapering to long filiform tips; soral paraphyses without dilated terminal cells; spores monolete.
Gemmae variable in length; body cells 2-16, rhizoid primordia present or absent.
Gemmae with 4-16 body cells, end cells equal to or smaller than medial cells; rhizoid primordia on some medial cells and regularly on end cells; sporophytes frequently produced.

Gemmae with 2-12 body cells but at least some 2-3-celled gemmae present, end cells often swollen and larger than medial cells; rhizoid primordia often absent on 1 or both end cells, seldom present on medial cells; sporophytes not produced.
